Class AbstractViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.adapter.AbstractViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnswersAdapter.ViewHolder, ConversationAdapter.ViewHolder, ConversationsAdapter.ViewHolder, QualityFeedbackAdapter.ViewHolder, QuickResponsesAdapter.ViewHolder, StartingPhrasesAdapter.ViewHolder

    public abstract class AbstractViewHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Base RecyclerView.ViewHolder class that works in conjunction with AbstractRecyclerViewAdapter.
